Name: Witch Amelia
About the game: 'Witch Amelia' is an RPG game produced by Mousou Endemic and published by Hanabi games. - Game plot Dreaming of becoming a hero, Rody and his childhood friend Amelia went on an adventure together. Both believe that their relationship and this feeling of happiness will last forever. - Game content This game is a role-playing type of game. Players will control the main character, Rody, improves his strength through constant exercise and strives to achieve his dream of being worthy of Amelia. - Game Features Jrpg turn-based combat Rich storyline
